Use: Teaches you how to ride this chopper.

itemData.name: Plans: Titanium Plating
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Plans: Titanium Plating
Binds when picked up
Requires Blacksmithing (450)
Requires Alliance Vanguard - Exalted
Use: Teaches you how to make a Titanium Plating.
1 Charge

Titanium Plating
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently attach lightweight titanium plating to a shield, increasing block value by 81 and reducing the duration of Disarm effects by 50%. Does not stack with other similar effects.

Attaching Titanium Plating to your shield causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 3

Requires Titanium Bar (4), Eternal Shadow (4)

itemData.name: Arcanum of the Savage Gladiator
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Arcanum of the Savage Gladiator
Binds to account
Requires level 1 to 80 (80)
Use: Permanently adds 30 Stamina and 25 resilience rating to a head slot item.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 37 50
